bill.summary:
Multilateral Aid Review Act of 2017
This bill establishes a United States Multilateral Aid Review to assess the value of U.S. government investments in multilateral entities.
The President shall establish an interagency Multilateral Review Task Force to review U.S. participation in multilateral entities and report to Congress.
The bill establishes the United States Multilateral Aid Review Peer Review Group to assist the task force.
